sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_gf.GoalManagementIntegrationSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GoalManagementIntegrationSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GoalManagementIntegrationSNC = Class.create();
GoalManagementIntegrationSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function(goalId) {
		this.goalId = goalId;
    },
	createProjectGoalRelationship: function(projectId, isPrimaryGoal){
		this.createWorkItemGoalRelationship(projectId, 'project', isPrimaryGoal);
	},
	createDemandGoalRelationship: function(demandId, isPrimaryGoal){
		this.createWorkItemGoalRelationship(demandId, 'demand', isPrimaryGoal);
	},
	createProgramGoalRelationship: function(programId, isPrimaryGoal){
		this.createWorkItemGoalRelationship(programId, 'program', isPrimaryGoal);
	},
	createEpicGoalRelationship: function(epicId, isPrimaryGoal){
		this.createWorkItemGoalRelationship(epicId, 'scrum_epic', isPrimaryGoal);
	},
	createWorkItemGoalRelationship: function(entityId, workItemType, isPrimaryGoal){
		var responseObj = {};
		var goalM2mGr = new GlideRecord(sn_gf.GoalFrameworkConstants.GOAL_RELATIONSHIP_TABLE);
		goalM2mGr.initialize();
		goalM2mGr.setValue('goal',this.goalId);
		goalM2mGr.setValue(workItemType,entityId);
		goalM2mGr.setValue('is_primary_goal',isPrimaryGoal);
		var sysId = goalM2mGr.insert();
		if(sysId){
			responseObj.success = true;
			responseObj.sysId = sysId;
			return responseObj;
		}
		responseObj.success = false;
		return responseObj;
	},
    type: 'GoalManagementIntegrationSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-04 11:41:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>63fcb185c331b010242836046d40ddb9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GoalManagementIntegrationSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Goal Framework" source="sn_gf">11879041532030103913ddeeff7b12d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Goal Framework">11879041532030103913ddeeff7b12d8</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_63fcb185c331b010242836046d40ddb9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-05 18:53:38</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
